atbat.des: Matt Wieters flies out to right fielder Magglio Ordonez in foul territory.

pitch.cc: Andrew Oliver is trying to tie up Matt Wieters with fastballs inside, where Matt Wieters hits .226.

atbat.des: Jake Fox singles on a line drive to left fielder Brennan Boesch.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Andrew Oliver; Jake Fox is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .774 OPS against them and .616 against everything else.

atbat.des: Julio Lugo triples (2) on a fly ball to right fielder Magglio Ordonez. Jake Fox scores.

pitch.cc: Andrew Oliver battled back from 3-0 to retire Julio Lugo.

atbat.des: Cesar Izturis singles on a line drive to right fielder Magglio Ordonez. Julio Lugo scores.

pitch.cc: Andrew Oliver had Cesar Izturis down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Corey Patterson grounds out to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Cesar Izturis to 2nd.

atbat.des: Nick Markakis walks. Miguel Tejada to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Eddie Bonine replaces Andrew Oliver.

atbat.des: Ty Wigginton doubles (13) on a ground ball to left fielder Brennan Boesch. Miguel Tejada scores. Nick Markakis to 3rd.

action.des: With Adam Jones batting, wild pitch by Eddie Bonine, Nick Markakis scores. Ty Wigginton to 3rd.

atbat.des: Adam Jones grounds out, shortstop Ramon Santiago to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Mark Hendrickson replaces Kevin Millwood.

atbat.des: Austin Jackson grounds out, third baseman Miguel Tejada to first baseman Jake Fox.

Magglio Ordonez flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.

pitch.cc: Mark Hendrickson got Magglio Ordonez to chase a changeup that he doesn't like to hit.

atbat.des: Miguel Cabrera doubles (26) on a line drive to left fielder Corey Patterson. Johnny Damon to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Mark Hendrickson went back to the four-seam fastball even though Miguel Cabrera hit for a double last time up.
